content: .http://www.bbc.co.uk/worldservice/news/2009/04/090416_chechnya_nh_sl.shtml After 15 years Chechnya is stable and ready to resume its place in the family of nations. The military campaign is over. So what happens now, an extended friendship mission?
reply: .http://www.bbc.co.uk/worldservice/news/2009/04/090416_chechnya_nh_sl.shtml After 15 years Chechnya is stable and ready to resume its place in the family of nations. The military campaign is over. So what happens now, an extended friendship mission?
title: It's Over! Victory in Chechnya!
